```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(janitor)
```
```{r}
gas_data <- read_csv("gas_data.csv") %>% 
  clean_names()
```

```{r}
# regression models for high and low income consumers (demand curves)

# Low 
lm_low <- lm(price_dollars ~ q_low_gallons, data = gas_data)
lm_low

# high
lm_high <- lm(price_dollars ~ q_high_gallons, data = gas_data)
lm_high
```
